attributes.action: Stop Wind Farm Development at Higher Burton Farm Dorset
attributes.additional_details: The proposal to effect 12 or more Wind Turbines in an area of outstanding natural beauty should not go ahead. The local community has not been fully engaged in the planning consultation and the views of those people most impacted are being ignored.  This proposal will have a severe impact and substantially reduce the land available for farming at a time when demand for crops and cattle related products is increasing.
